All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
THE APPLICATION - entry point for the GymBros app init and konsole prompt - starting workout, viewing workout history, settings customization and to analyze
ConsoleUtils
util class for konsole operations - clearing screen and sleeping non-instantiable class, provides static helper methods to interact with the terminal
CustomExerciseManager
provides CLI utilities to manage user defined exs includes options to create and delete ex
CustomTemplateManager
handles creation, loading, deletion, and persistence of user workout template templates are stored as mapping from template name to list of exxs
Exercise
represents single exercise + targeted muscle groups and XP computation coeffs (which are wildely tuned - I am not paid for this shit luckily) immutable and serializable via Jackson -> persistence
ExerciseCatalog
catalog of exercises + built in and user custom made exercises loading/saving from JSON, lookup by name, duplication detection allows lookup and management of Exercise instances by name
ExerciseLister
utility class for listing exxs from the catalog allows users to list all available ex or filter by targeted muscle group
MuscleGroup
enumeration of all supported muscle groups used for primary || secondary detection in regards to exercise
MuscleProgress
tracks aggregated progress for a muscle group during workouts stores cumulative counts of repetitions, time in seconds, number of distinct logged ex entries
MuscleTracker
handles tracking and persistance permuscle ex stats updates and maintains data in muscle_progress.json
SessionEntry
represents one logged set during particular workout that contains performed exs, reps, weight, duration and XP
SettingsMenu
settings UI logic for users, that can: - manage exercises - view muscle usage statistics - use workout templates static-only utility class
TemplateSandboxManager
ui for custom workout templates allows users to create, list, or delete their own workout routines
ViewMuscleProgress
util class that displays stored muscle training progress data from JSON src/main/resources/muscle_progress.json
ViewWorkoutHistory
utility class providing functionality to view users workout history.
WorkoutHistory
represents users history of workout sessions stores ordered list of completed WorkoutSessions
WorkoutRepository
repository for storing and retrieving workout session data in regards to disk JSON ser via Jackson
WorkoutSession
represents a single workout session + start/end time + logged sets
WorkoutSessionManager
manages lifecycle of a workout session handles user interactions during the session thats logging, finishing or aborting the session and saving sesh data
